alert.note: Alert for Polk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 3:44PM CDT until July 27 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CHISAGO AND NORTHWESTERN POLK COUNTIES... At 344 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near North Branch, or 17 miles east of Cambridge, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... North Branch, Rush City, Harris, Rush City Airport, Wolf Creek, Branch, Cushing, Wild River State Park and Chengwatana State Forest. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
